author: Special Correspondent
text:
DMK president M. Karunanidhi on Tuesday handed over Rs. 1 lakh as solatium to the next of kin of Villupuram college student Priyanka who was found dead under mysterious circumstances along with two of her college mates recently.

Mr. Karunanidhi, who was touring his Assembly constituency over the past two days, came to know that one of the three girls who died under mysterious circumstances near Villupuram hailed from Tiruvarur. DMK local leaders contacted Priyanka's mother Jayanthi and sister Divya Bharathi and conveyed his deep concern over the death of the girls. On Tuesday, Jayanthi and Divya Bharathi met Mr. Karunanidhi at the residence of his sister here when he offered his condolences besides handing over Rs. 1 lakh as solatium to them.
title: DMK chief’s gesture
